item.title: Headed to Portland
item.description: 12:16 Friday 09 March 2018 JST I’m leaving in about an hour for a weekend in Portland. It’s for a training called The Container of Leadership. I will be challenged to look deeply at myself, really digging down into my -isms and other thoughts which unconsiously underly my perception of the world.
